title: Client crashes in old champ select.
body: My client tends to crash when i try to load into the old champ select. its really annoying and has got me a ton of penalties from "dodging" when it is just failing to load and closing itself down. It has been doing this for a while now and its done it twice today.

replies.body: This can happen when third party programs aren't interacting well with league.  If you have any running like play.tv remove them as a first step.  Let me know if that fixes your issue!
I don't have any 3rd party programs to my knowledge though
